Package src.recomanador.domini

Class HybridFiltering

java.lang.Object
src.recomanador.domini.HybridFiltering
public class HybridFiltering extends Object
This class implements the recomendation algorithm using a combination of Content-Based filtering and Collaborative Filtering. For details about its implementation, please check the "Algorithms and Data-Structures" sections of the documentation

    • setData

      public void setData(ConjuntItems items, ConjuntUsuaris usuaris, ConjuntRecomanacions valoracions)
      Sets the instance with the given items, users and recommendations
      Parameters:
      items - Set of items
      usuaris - Set of users
      valoracions - set of recommendations (which include ratings)

    • hybridFiltering

      public ArrayList<ItemValoracioEstimada> hybridFiltering(int Q, int user_ID, int K) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException
      Returns a set of item IDs, sorted by relevance, using Hybrid Filtering
      Parameters:
      Q - how many items to be recommended
      user_ID - ID of the user to be recommended
      K - number of clusters to be generated on k-means
      Returns:
      a sorted set the recommended item IDs with their estimated ratings
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException - if the id specified is not valid

    • usuaris_cluster

      private ArrayList<Usuari> usuaris_cluster(int user_ID, int K) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException
      Executes k-means and returns the set of IDs of the users in the same cluster than user_ID
      Parameters:
      user_ID - ID of the user whose cluster will be returned
      K - The value of K
      Returns:
      users of the cluster
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException - if the id specified is not valid

    • distance

      private float distance(int idx_usuari, int centroid)
      Returns the distance between a user and a centroid.
      Parameters:
      idx_usuari - identifier of a user
      centroid - index of a centroid
      Returns:
      the distance between the user and the centroid
